data.meta_description: The BRM Porsche 911 GT1, is a Detailed High Quality, 1/24 scale, Ready to Run Competition Slot Car. Featuring a specially designed CNC Black Two Piece Anodised Aluminium Chassis with Floating Y Plate. The chassis also fe
data.text:
The BRM Porsche 911 GT1, is a Detailed High Quality, 1/24 scale, Ready to Run Competition Slot Car. Featuring a specially designed CNC Black Two Piece Anodised Aluminium Chassis with Floating Y Plate. The chassis also features a Blue Anodized Aluminium Motor Mount, and Front and Rear Axle Carriers. The Axles are Ø3mm and fitted with Ball Bearings. And the car is powered by the Black BRM 25 000 rpm Long-Can motor mounted in Angle-winder Configuration.

The detailed body features a High Quality, Deep Gloss Paint Finish, with Sharp Tampo Printing and a Lightweight interior complete with driver figure.

Drivers: Pedro Lamy - Armin Hahne - Patrice Goueslard

Race: 24 Hours of Le Mans 1997 - 5th - 331 Laps

Team: Schubel Engineering

Key Features

Fast Opening System Body Mount

New CNC Two Piece Black Anodized Aluminium Racing Chassis

Floating Y Plate

BRM Black 25 000rpm Long Can Motor - Angle-winder configuration

Ball Bearing Front and Rear Axles

Aluminium Wheels Front and Rear

Detailed Body with High Quality deep gloss paint finish

Floating Body Mount System

Detailed Interior with Driver Figure

Digital Ready Chassis (Machined to accept Digital Chips)

Runs on 1/32nd Scale Track Systems

Will run on Carrera, Scalextric, SCX and Ninco Track Systems

Age Suitability 14+

Safety Notice: Warning! This product is not suitable for children under 14 years because of small parts which can present a choking hazard and functional sharp edges. This product contains magnets.

Specs

Motor: BRM T-RS Black 25 000rpm, (325gcm @12v) Long Can Motor (S033S)

Pinion: 11T Brass Ø6.4 mm Pinion (S075)

Spur Gear: 41T Nylon AW Spur Gear Ø21.6mm (S066S)

Gear ratio: 11:41

Motor Configuration: Rear Mounted Angle-winder Motor, with Rear 2 wheel drive

Guide: Sprung Swivel Guide (23 x 7 mm) with replaceable braids (S026SS)

Magnatraction: No

Alloy wheels: Front (S322) and Rear (S323)

Axle/Hub width: 75mm Front, and 80mm Rear

Tyre diameter/width: 26(ext), 20(int) x 12 mm Hard Front (S305), and 28(ext), 20(int) x 15 mm Standard Rear (S306P)

Overall length: 195 mm

Width: 86mm

Height: 45mm

Wheelbase: 103mm

Chassis Weight: 140 g

Body Weight: 55g

Weight: 195gm

Lights: No

Digital Ready: No, but chassis will accept Digital Chips

Body Detail: High Detail Resin body with Lexan Interior

Class: GT1

Scale: 1/24

Contents

1 x BRM154 BRM Porsche 911 GT1 - #33 Hutchison Le Mans 1997
